channel.title: 2021 Events on Perth Linux Users Group
channel.description: Recent content in 2021 Events on Perth Linux Users Group

item.title: February Talk: Puppet by Simon Anderson
item.description: Managing fleets of systems can sometimes lead to boring and repetitive work, which in turn can lead to mistakes being made and productivity dropping. I will be talking about how we can use some simple tools to streamline and standardise the tasks so that system admins and the like and use their time more productively and more enjoyable whilst not having to worry about human-error mistakes being made (as much)
